welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Ahlen, Germany! Known for its picturesque streets and warm hospitality, we invite you to explore our city and experience all it has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dortmund Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Guetersloh Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Guetersloh Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours per day.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Main terminal for domestic and international flights

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Secondary terminal for domestic and regional flights

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport
